name: (R) Best HP TS (Resist. Heat, No Cool)
_description: Best available air source heat pump (w/ cold climates specs as applicable) fully replacing original resistance equipment, no existing cooling.

notes: COP = SEER / 3.412, COP = HSPF / 3.412 (see EIA source)
split system conversion factors SEER2/SEER = 0.95, HSPF2/HSPF = 0.85 (see RESNET source)
